TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Luhung, title = Luhung, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Luhung} }

S.FORM: == Luhung == u sulit nu Hulam: 基國派部落 u siwkay nu niyazu' i Taoyuan a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Luhung. u kasalumaluma' nu Luhung sa, 248 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 749 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 597 ku tademaw, pakalatu 80%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 152 ku tademaw, pakalatu 20%. u kasabinacadan, Tayan(Tayal) 75%,Pangcha(Amis) 2%,Paywan(Paiwan) 1%, zumazuma 2%. u Tayan a niyazu' u Tayan(Tayal) a niyazu' kuyni, katuud ku Tayan(Tayal) a tademaw itini. u zuma a tademaw sa u Pangcah(Amis), u Yuwatan(Bunun), u Taluku(Truku), inayi' tu ku zuma a cidakay itini mueneng u Sakizaya a tademaw inayi' ku Sakizaya a tademaw mueneng itini, hakay izaw tu, caay henay misumad ku cidekay a ngangan nu Sakizaya. u cidekay nu Taywan Yincumin u niyazu' sa, u luyaluy nu tademaw, pulung muengeneng, u kabana' kami, hina u lalumaay amin i niyazu', caay kayadah ku ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamu, atu kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tumuk) saca babalaki mililid tu niyazu'. i Taywan Yincumin, izaw ku 16 cidekay puluung sa 748 a niyazu', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ku Pangcah(Amis), saadidi'ay a cidekay ku Laaluwa. u tabakiaya a niyazu' sa, ku Tapalong, u niyazu' nu Pangcah(Amis). tademaw nu Yincumin , pulung sausi katukuh 2017 a mihca 9 a bulad tademaw nu Yincumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2018 a mihcan 4 a bulad pulung sausi (561,327), Pangcah (209,430), Tayan (90,059), Paywan (100,689), Yuwatan (58,390), Rukay (13,314), Puyuma (14,140), Cou (6,635), Saysiat (6,607), Yami (4,606), Saw (785), Kabalan (1,465), Taluku (31,501), Sakizaya (929), Sejek (9,992), Laaluwa (399), Kanakanabu (334), zuma (12,052)

== Lohong == o solit no Holam: 基國派部落 o siwkay no niyazo' i Taoyoan a kowan no Kalinko ko niyazo' no Lohong. o kasalomaloma' no Lohong sa, 248 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 749 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no Ingcomin sa, 597 ko tademaw, pakalato 80%. o zoma sa, cay ko Ingcomin, 152 ko tademaw, pakalato 20%. o kasabinacadan, Tayan(Tayal) 75%,Pangcha(Amis) 2%,Paywan(Paiwan) 1%, zomazoma 2%. o Tayan a niyazo' o Tayan(Tayal) a niyazo' koyni, katood ko Tayan(Tayal) a tademaw itini. o zoma a tademaw sa o Pangcah(Amis), o Yowatan(Bonon), o Taloko(Troko), inayi' to ko zoma a cidakay itini moeneng o Sakizaya a tademaw inayi' ko Sakizaya a tademaw moeneng itini, hakay izaw to, caay henay misomad ko cidekay a ngangan no Sakizaya. o cidekay no Taywan Yincomin o niyazo' sa, o loyaloy no tademaw, polong moengeneng, o kabana' kami, hina o lalomaay amin i niyazo', caay kayadah ko ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamo, ato kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tomok) saca babalaki mililid to niyazo'. i Taywan Yincomin, izaw ko 16 cidekay poloong sa 748 a niyazo', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ko Pangcah(Amis), saadidi'ay a cidekay ko Laalowa. o tabakiaya a niyazo' sa, ko Tapalong, o niyazo' no Pangcah(Amis). tademaw no Yincomin , polong saosi katokoh 2017 a mihca 9 a bolad tademaw no Yincomin, polong saosi katokoh 2018 a mihcan 4 a bolad polong saosi (561,327), Pangcah (209,430), Tayan (90,059), Paywan (100,689), Yowatan (58,390), Rokay (13,314), Poyoma (14,140), Coo (6,635), Saysiat (6,607), Yami (4,606), Saw (785), Kabalan (1,465), Taloko (31,501), Sakizaya (929), Sejek (9,992), Laalowa (399), Kanakanabo (334), zoma (12,052)
